Snow White is in my opinion a bad movie on an artistic point of view. The plot is pretty much foreseeable, the characters are stereotypes, the editing too. The movie is pale by comparison to more recent Disney fairy tales, thanks to computer graphics. The biggest mistake to me is that the picture was pretty much devoid of magic. Michael Dudikoff stars as Joe Armstrong a martial artist who fights ninjas who are stealing weapons from the U.S Army, in this entertaining yet admittedly brainless action film. In Canada, MTV brought the film on their program 15 minutes of Fame ; It was also later released overseas as Forbidden Ninja and The Challenger . A TV series of the same name was produced for Katharine Peck but was a flop.
